Skirling Pass08143ilvl8r2t545wzjs6q4aes09x128d3xy1770142015-03-15T16:59:42ZSharp Blades26158496[[Image:Skirling Pass.png|thumb|right|200px|A map showing the location of Skirling Pass on the continent of Westeros.]]
[[Image:Wilding's Camp 2x10.png|thumb|right|200px|Mance Rayder's camp in the Skirling Pass.]]

The '''Skirling Pass''' is a major passage through the [[Frostfangs]], located north and west of [[the Wall]]. The pass links the [[Frozen Shore]] to the [[Haunted Forest]], both territories held by the [[Free Folk|wildlings]].
sections.In the books: In the ''[[A Song of Ice and Fire]]'' novels, the Skirling Pass is named for the keening sound the wind makes as it blows through it. The pass has been a traveling and trading route for millennia. An ancient stone archway is located at the top of the pass. A large glacier and a frozen lake are located at either side of a hidden valley near the top of the pass, where Mance Rayder's army made camp.
sections.History:
===[[Season 2]]===
[[Qhorin]] takes a scouting party into the Skirling Pass to attack the lookouts posted there by [[Mance Rayder]].<ref>"[[The Ghost of Harrenhal]]"</ref> [[Ygritte]] later shows [[Jon Snow]] Mance's massive camp, located in the pass.<ref>"[[Valar Morghulis]]"</ref>
